title: No Limit Public License
description: This license is basically the same as the WTFPL (with slightly less profanity). It is Free and GPL-Compatible.

can.title: Commercial Use
can.description: Describes the ability to use the software for commercial purposes.

can.title: Modify
can.description: Describes the ability to modify the software and create derivatives.

can.title: Distribute
can.description: Describes the ability to distribute original or modified (derivative) works.

can.title: Sublicense
can.description: Describes the ability for you to grant/extend a license to the software.

can.title: Include Copyright
can.description: Describes whether the original copyright must be retained.

can.title: Include Original
can.description: Describes whether copies of the original software or instructions to obtain copies must be distributed with the software.

can.title: Include License
can.description: Including the full text of license in modified software.

can.title: Private Use
can.description: Describes the ability to use/modify software freely without distributing it.

fulltext:
